content: How can I rearrange this sentence in a more natural way using Ruby code? The original sentence is: "I have already called your service twice last week solved problem."

To rearrange the sentence more naturally using Ruby code, you can utilize string manipulation techniques. Here's an example of how you might do it:

```ruby
original_sentence = "I have already called your service twice last week solved problem."

# Rearrange the sentence
rearranged_sentence = "Last week, I called your service twice, and the problem was solved."

puts rearranged_sentence
```

In this example, I manually arranged the sentence to make it more natural. The Ruby code simply assigns the more natural sentence to a variable and then prints it out.
